caption:
This photograph captures an industrial scene, featuring a large paper mill named "Parchment Paper Company." The main building in the image is an expansive multi-story brick structure with many windows and includes several vertical elements like chimneys and pipes, characteristic of industrial manufacturing facilities of its time.

In the foreground, there is a body of water, possibly a pond, that reflects the image of the paper mill, doubling its visual presence in the photo. Along the edge of the water, some scrub vegetation and dirt can be seen, depicting a somewhat neglected or natural industrial boundary.

The sky above is mostly clear with a few clouds, suggesting it might be a sunny day. This outdoor natural lighting enhances the details of the building and its architectural features. The reflection in the water adds a serene yet somewhat somber tone to the otherwise industrial scene, inviting contemplation on nature versus industry.
title: The Fitchburg Paper Company on the Nashua River. Mill wastes impart varying colors to this heavily polluted river.
